about_the_game:
Trivia War is a fast-paced, local multiplayer trivia battle where knowledge is power—and survival is everything. Battle your friends or take on the AI in a fight to the last brain standing! Answer questions correctly to unleash powerful attacks on your opponents, upgrade your weapons, and outsmart everyone to be the last one alive.

Gameplay Features:

  • Answer, Attack, Survive – Correct answers let you unleash devastating attacks on your opponents. The more questions you nail, the stronger your arsenal becomes!

  • 4-Player Local Multiplayer – Grab up to three friends and go head-to-head in this fast-paced trivia showdown. Play solo or team up in 2v2 mode for even more strategic fun.

  • Multiple Modes for Maximum Mayhem – Play on your terms with customizable options like Immunity Mode, where the fastest answerer becomes immune to attacks, or One Shot Kill Mode, where a single hit spells defeat. Adjust health and damage for your perfect level of chaos.

  • Steam Remote Play Together – Bring the battle online! Play with friends far and wide via Steam’s Remote Play Together for seamless multiplayer fun.

  • Customizable Avatars & Themes – Choose from quirky, adorable avatars and switch up the entire game’s look with over a dozen vibrant themes. Make your trivia battle as unique as you are!

  • Fast-Paced Combat – Trivia isn't just about answering questions—it's about strategy. Answer quickly to launch attacks, but don’t forget: wrong answers can leave you wide open for counterattacks!

  • Endless Replayability – With tons of customizable settings, fun modes, and a variety of avatars and battle themes, each match feels fresh and exciting.

Will your knowledge be enough to defeat your friends and reign supreme in Trivia War?
